## hbs-tooling package

Utility functions to implement handlebars based tooling functionality.

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [createCompiler(aHandlebars)](./hbs-tooling.createcompiler.md) | Constructs a handlebars compiler |
|  [rxApplyTemplates(aCtx$, aTemp$)](./hbs-tooling.rxapplytemplates.md) | Applies templates to a set of contexts |
|  [rxReadTemplates(aDir, aHandlebars)](./hbs-tooling.rxreadtemplates.md) | Reads a list of files and interprets them as templates, both in the filename and the content. |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [VERSION](./hbs-tooling.version.md) | Version and build number of the package |

## Type Aliases

|  Type Alias | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [HandlebarsType](./hbs-tooling.handlebarstype.md) | Type definition on the handlebars API |
|  [TemplateDescriptor](./hbs-tooling.templatedescriptor.md) | Representation of a file descriptor with templates for both the file name and the file content. |
|  [TemplateType](./hbs-tooling.templatetype.md) | Type definition on the handlebars template function that transforms a context into a markup string |
